comment.author: 87886843@N03
comment._content: When I was born, this is what an airliner looked like.  Now, when I fly on a jumbo jet, I think about those old tri-motors.  We've come a long way.

comment.author: 87886843@N03
comment._content: I've heard stories about Ford Trimotors that crashed, and were rebuilt.  They were not very fast, usually cruising at about 100 mph.  They probably had a stall speed of about 60. (Guessing). At that speed, landing in a cow pasture might not destroy the whole plane.
